method.name: client_id
method.description: Optional. The Discord application ID for your game. Defaults to the value set by <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1Client_1ad452335c06b28be0406dab824acccc49" kindref="member">Client::SetApplicationId</ref>.

method.name: scopes
method.description: Scopes is a space separated string of the oauth scopes your game is requesting. Most games should just pass in <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1Client_1a71499da752fbdc2d4326ae0fd36c0dd1" kindref="member">Client::GetDefaultCommunicationScopes</ref> or <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1Client_1a7648bd1d2f7d9a86ebd0edb8bef12b5c" kindref="member">Client::GetDefaultPresenceScopes</ref> which will include these scopes, respectively: [code]openid sdk.social_layer[/code] or [code]openid sdk.social_layer_presence[/code] [code]sdk.social_layer[/code] and [code]sdk.social_layer_presence[/code] automatically expand to include all the necessary scopes for the integration. You can pass in additional scopes if you need to, but as a general rule you should only request the scopes you actually need, and the user will need to grant access to those additional scopes as well.
